title: Amazon Essentials Long Sleeve Waffle Henley Shirts for Men, Slim-Fit
description: SLIM FIT: Our men's long sleeve henley shirts are designed to contour through shoulders, chest, and waist for a modern and tailored look that enhances your style effortlessly.
SUPER SOFT FABRIC: Made with a comfortable cotton blend knit in a lightweight waffle texture, these thermal henley shirts for men offer comfort and breathability.
VERSATILE STYLE: This men's henley long sleeve is a wardrobe essential, ideal for wearing solo or layering for a classic, all-season look.
DETAILS MATTER: Features ribbed trim at neckline and cuffs, a sleek three-button placket, and refined back neck half moon detail in our men's long sleeve henley shirts.
CONSISTENT SIZING: With our focus on a dependable fit, you'll find our men's casual long sleeve shirts match your comfort needs.

This henley long sleeve shirt for men offers a refined slim fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist, creating a sleek silhouette that's great for both work and play. Crafted from a soft cotton blend, the lightweight waffle thermal texture provides warmth and breathability, making it an ideal choice for layering or wearing on its own. Designed to be an everyday essential, these men's casual long sleeve shirts are versatile, pairing effortlessly with jeans or chinos for a look that is both polished and relaxed. With thoughtful detailing like ribbed trim at the neckline and sleeve cuffs, plus a three-button placket, this men's long sleeve henley shirt showcases both functionality and fashion. Our collection of men's waffle long sleeve shirt options redefines casual wear with enduring quality you can trust.

Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men's must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.
